Set geographic targeting rules for a lin: Set geographic targeting rules for a link with specific destination per country.
Create a new short link with optional pa: Create a new short link with optional parameters (title, UTM tags, expiration, cloaking, etc.)
Permanently delete a short link by its u: Permanently delete a short link by its unique link ID.
Set an expiration date or click limit to: Set an expiration date or click limit to deactivate a short link.
Retrieve usage stats (clicks, conversion: Retrieve usage stats (clicks, conversions) for a domain within a time period.
Retrieve detailed information about a sh: Retrieve detailed information about a short link using its domain and path.
Retrieve click statistics for specific s: Retrieve click statistics for specific short links by their IDs.
Retrieve all links on a domain, with pag: Retrieve all links on a domain, with pagination and date-range filters.
Update an existing short link's original: Update an existing short link's original URL, path, title, or other properties using its link ID.
Make a custom API call to a specific end: 将一个自定义 API 调用到一个特定的终点
Title: 标题
Select the domain to use for the link: Select the domain to use for the link
Select the short link from the domain: Select the short link from the domain
ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (e.g., U: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (e.g., US, GB, CA, IN). Must be exactly 2 characters.
The destination URL when users from this: The destination URL when users from this country access the link. Must be a valid URL.
Select the folder to add the link to.
The HTTP status code for the redirect. T: The HTTP status code for the redirect. The default is 302 (Found).
The date and time when the link will bec: The date and time when the link will become inactive.
Array of tags for the link: Array of tags for the link
⚠️ CAUTION: Link will be PERMANENTLY DEL: ⚠️ CAUTION: Link will be PERMANENTLY DELETED after this many seconds. This action cannot be undone. Use with extreme caution.
Overrides the creation time of the link.
Disable link after specified number of c: Disable link after specified number of clicks (minimum: 1)
Custom path for the short link (optional: Custom path for the short link (optional).
The ID of the short link you want to del: The ID of the short link you want to delete (e.g., lnk_61Mb_0dnRUg3vvtmAPZh3dhQh6)
Optional URL to redirect users when the: Optional URL to redirect users when the link has expired.
Select the domain to get statistics for: Select the domain to get statistics for
Select a predefined time interval or cho: Select a predefined time interval or choose "Custom" to set specific dates.
Start date for statistics (required when: Start date for statistics (required when period is "Custom").
End date for statistics (required when p: End date for statistics (required when period is "Custom").
Timezone for statistics (e.g., UTC, Amer: Timezone for statistics (e.g., UTC, America/New_York, Europe/London). Defaults to UTC.
Granularity for click statistics chart d: Granularity for click statistics chart data.
The path/slug of the short link (e.g., \: The path/slug of the short link (e.g., "abc123", "my-link"). Do not include domain or slashes.
Select the domain containing the links: Select the domain containing the links
List of link IDs to fetch click statisti: List of link IDs to fetch click statistics for (e.g., lnk_61Mb_0dnRUg3vvtmAPZh3dhQh6).
Select the domain to retrieve links from: Select the domain to retrieve links from
Number of results to return (1-150). Def: Number of results to return (1-150). Default is 50.
Filter by exact creation time (ISO forma: Filter by exact creation time (ISO format or timestamp).
Return links created before this date an: Return links created before this date and time.
Return links created after this date and: Return links created after this date and time.
Token for paginated results (get this fr: Token for paginated results (get this from previous response).
Authorization headers are injected autom: 授权头自动从您的连接中注入。
Enable for files like PDFs, images, etc..
HEAD: 黑色
Fires when a new short link is created o: Fires when a new short link is created on a domain. Useful to sync newly created links to other systems.
Select the domain to monitor for new lin: Select the domain to monitor for new links
How often to check for new links. More f: How often to check for new links. More frequent polling may hit rate limits.
